title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Mobile Gamification Learning for Practical Mathematical Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and native language literacy (reading/writing) skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately translate and use 20 job-related mathematics terms into the local language.

Learners achieve 80% accuracy in solving mathematics problems (e.g., medication dosage calculations, contract numerical interpretation) required in daily life and work scenarios using a gamification app.
Learners form a self-directed review routine using a mobile app at least three times a week to maintain mathematics communication skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
